comment: If your not strong at Chemistry, Inorganic is a hard course. Dr. Zvi is nice and he means well but he is not gonna tack on major points in the end. Increase you test scores constantly to get the grade you want.
Hes a really nice professor and he means well. Inorganic is the easiest. Make sure you take advantage of any opportunities he gives for points because he will not curve much.
He talks a lot and is always late in returning assignments.

Chemistry is supposed to be fairly difficult, however, Szafran is a great teacher.  If you attend class, take notes and pay attention, ask questions when you need to, you will do fine. He makes some odd analogies, but they always help.  He cares about his students success, so if you try he'll help you!

One of the best professors I have ever had.  Makes it easy to pay attention in class.  Obviously loves what he does and knows his discipline inside and out. Prepares students well for exams with valid practice exams.  Gives mandatory homework but grades by effort so its an easy A to factor with your exam grades.
